title: Calculate Duke Energy's (NYSE: DUK) implied average retail electricity price per MWh for FY 2024. Round to the nearest two decimals.
description:
1) Define the average retail revenue per MWh as Retail electric revenue (Electric Utilities & Infrastructure) / Total retail electric sales in MWh for 2024. 
 
 2) Find Duke Energy's FY 2024 retail electric revenue for Electric Utilities & Infrastructure as $24,593 million. 
 
 3) Find FY 2024 total retail electric sales as 214,585 GWh from the Electric Utilities & Infrastructure segment in the 2024 earnings release report ("Gigawatt-hour (GWh) Sales" segment
  
 4) Convert the 214585 GWh to MWh as 214,585 GWh Ã— 1,000 = 214,585,000 MWh. 
 
 5) Calculate the implied average retail price per MWh as $24,593 million / 214,585,000 MWh =$114.60726
 
 6) Round to two decimals= $114.61 per MWh.
answer: Implied average retail electricity price for FY 2024: $114.61 per MWh.

rubric.criteria: Defines the average retail revenue per MWh as Retail electric revenue (Electric Utilities & Infrastructure) / Total retail electric sales in MWh for 2024.
States FY 2024 Retail electric revenue for Electric Utilities & Infrastructure as $24,593 million.
States the FY2024 total retail electric sales as 214,585 GWh from the Electric Utilities & Infrastructure segment.
Converts the 214,585 GWh to 214,585,000 MWh using a factor of 1,000.
Calculates the unrounded implied average retail price per MWh as $114.60726.
Rounds the implied average retail price to two decimals and reports $114.61 per MWh as the final answer.
